frameDefinitions: A Protagonist has become aware of a possible Danger (a dangerous event or a Dangerous_entity that might participate in an event harmful to the Protagonist) and is ready to engage in an Activity in response to that Danger.
The words in this frame involve an Undesirable_event which affects the Patient negatively.
An Experiencer must cope with some Condition for a prolonged period, usually against his or her will.
This frame has to do with people (the Residents) residing in Locations, sometimes with a Co-resident.

An Experiencer actualizes a certain pattern of behavior, a Lifestyle, which persists for a significant period of time in the Experiencer's life and is recognized as part of his character or normal routine.
A Protagonist is in the dynamic, maintained state of being alive or has exited this state.
frameExamples: All tropps are on high <t>alert</t> for possible intruders following an attack on a nearby compound.
The first <t>calamity</t> was a disastrous trade war with Holland.
He <t>lived</t> a hedonistic life before he settled down.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the <fen>Protagonist</fen> who is prepared to undertake some action in response to a <fen>Danger</fen>.
The action that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is prepared to do.
A dangerous event or situation which teh <fen>Protagonist</fen> is aware of and is ready to respond to.
An entity of which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is aware and which poses a danger.
The time when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is on alert to the potential Danger.
The undesirable event which occurs.
The entity that experiences the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen>.
When the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen> occurs.
Where the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen> takes place.
A person who experiences the effects of some situation or <fen>Condition</fen> for a long period of time.
This role describes the situation that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> must cope with over a long period of time.
A general description of the temporal location of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> while coping with the <fen>Condition</fen>.
Where the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is located when he or she faces the <fen>Condition</fen>.
The individual(s) that reside at the <fen>Location</fen>.
The place in which somebody resides.
A person or group of people that the resident is staying with or among.
This role refers to the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Resident</fen> resides.
The person who actualizes a pattern of behavior.
A pattern of behavior which the actions of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> matches for a significant period of time.
The <fen>Lifestyle</fen> may be characterized by a <fen>Manner</fen>, which is often expressed adverbially.
A temporal description of when the <fen>Experiencer</fen> adopts a <fen>Lifestyle</fen>.
The spatial location where the <fen>Experiencer</fen> carries out a <fen>Lifestyle</fen>.
<fen>Protagonist</fen> identifies the being or entity that is  dead or alive.
This role identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target.
The time in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is dead or alive.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Troops</fex> are on high alert following a string of bombings downtown.
You should be on alert <fex>to evacuate within 30 minutes of hearing the siren</fex> .
We were all on guard <fex>for possible attempts to sabotage the operation</fex>.
An <fex>environmental</fex> disaster is just what we need.
He lived <fex>the life of a beggar</fex>.

passageCandidateSpans.text: the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
